anime.description: Jinbao was a very timid and kind-hearted soldier from Liang (once in the three kingdoms); he always dreamed about a land without war, the Merryland. Though he was derided by his comrade, he still trusted his faith. One day, his camps were ambushed, during the battle; Jinbao fled and fell into an abyss. In the moment of life or death, Jinbao still maintain his belief in the mysterious Merryland, but suddenly the pendant that his grandfather gave him sparked, and Jinbao was forced to travel into another dimension...
